metadata.title: CVE-2022-46877 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: By confusing the browser, the fullscreen notification could have beendelayed or suppressed, resulting in potential user confusion or spoofingattacks. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 108.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
